result.execSummary:
The defendant Shekila L Howard was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: probation term defendant is currently serving.

miscConds.notes: Court costs paid from bond posted.

-AODA and any counseling/treatment deemed appropriate.
-Absolute sobriety.
-Random tests.
-Submit DNA sample.
-Pay supervision fees.

Defendant Shekila L Howard in court with attorney Lauria Ann Lynch-German.  Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives time limits, requests another status date. Bail to continue.  Status hearing scheduled for December 7, 2015 at 08:45 am.

State appears by Attorney Jeff Sisley. Defendant Shekila Howard appears by video from Ozaukee County Jail with Attorney Jamie McClendon. State requests $1000 cash bail with conditions.
